name: MEC All Day Active V-Neck T-shirt - Men's
description:
This lightweight shirt easily makes the cut for hot-weather dressing. A step up from active-wear, it's great for travel (and lets you skip a laundry session or two).Slim fit has an athletic, tailored look.Active odour control lets you go a couple extra days between washes.UPF 30 helps block UV during long days in the sun.Comfortable polyester, spandex blend wicks away sweat, dries quickly and moves with you, without losing its shape.Stealthy hanger loop for quick drying and less wrinkles.

Slim fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
